trans-unit.source: Customizes the caching behavior of a type in document-level customizations.
trans-unit.target: 自定义文档级自定义中的类型的缓存行为。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType> offer a greater degree of control over caching behavior to the developer than classes that simply conform to the requirements of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 类实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType>提供更大程度上控制缓存行为向开发人员只需遵守的要求的类比<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>。
有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: Called after the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] has finished loading the type.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 完成加载类型之后调用。

trans-unit.source: Called after a save operation is completed for the type.
trans-unit.target: 在完成类型的保存操作之后调用。

trans-unit.source: Called before the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] loads the type.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 加载类型之前调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the state of the type should not be loaded from the data cache; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不应从数据缓存中加载类型的状态，则为 <see langword="false" />；否则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Called before the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] persists the type into the document.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 将类型保留在文档中之前调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the state of the type should not be saved; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不应保存类型的状态，则为 <see langword="false" />；否则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cached type has changed since the last time it was saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示自上次保存缓存类型以来，该缓存类型是否更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cached type has been changed since it was last saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果缓存的类型已更改自上次，保存;否则为<see langword="false" />。
